verses.verse: Happy is the man who has not walked in the counsel of the wicked ones, and has not stood in the way of sinners, and has not sat in the seat of scorners.
But his delight is only in the Law of Jehovah, and he meditates in His Law day and night.
And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivulets of waters, which will give its fruit in its seasons, and its leaf will not wither, and all which he does will prosper.
Not so are the wicked ones, but they are only as chaff which the wind drives about.
On account of this the wicked one shall not stand in the judgment, and sinners not in the company of the righteous ones.
For Jehovah is knowing the way of the righteous ones, and the way of the wicked ones shall perish.
